feat: Implement NestJS backend with PostgreSQL

- Add complete backend structure with NestJS framework
- Implement JWT authentication (login/register)
- Create CRUD endpoints for Ideas, Documents, Prompts, Users
- Add TypeORM entities with PostgreSQL support
- Configure Docker Compose for PostgreSQL + pgAdmin
- Add Swagger API documentation
- Create API client for frontend integration
- Update authService to support backend mode

Modules implemented:
- Auth: JWT-based authentication
- Users: Profile management
- Ideas: Full CRUD with priority scoring
- Documents: CRUD with version control
- Prompts: CRUD with favorites and usage tracking
